body_html: @martinwicke, do you have any api thoughts. My thought is that I'd prefer this to be a separate call as this would keep it more similar to numpy (which doesn't have begin_axis and end_axis teither). You could call it partial_reshape() or something.
body_text: @martinwicke, do you have any api thoughts. My thought is that I'd prefer this to be a separate call as this would keep it more similar to numpy (which doesn't have begin_axis and end_axis teither). You could call it partial_reshape() or something.
body: @martinwicke, do you have any api thoughts. My thought is that I'd prefer this to be a separate call as this would keep it more similar to numpy (which doesn't have begin_axis and end_axis teither). You could call it partial_reshape() or something.
